When looking for information about pools and mined blocks, it can be about the latest 24 hours (by default) or about more days
Show notification when BTC reaches an specified price
When notifications are enabled, this app will tell you when the BitCoin price is upper (or lower) than the price you selected (in dolars)
Download the latest version to have new features and get problems solved
Ooops, BitCoin Pools has failed. Please, help me improving this application sending me a crash report
This app requires Internet connection for working. Please, turn on your mobile data or connect to a WiFi network

BitCoin Pools: get information about the latest BTC pools and more
Copyright © 2017 - Javinator9889
GitHub project
Click for full Terms of Service
Access to the GitHub project right here: GitHub

Version 1.18.4 (09/06/18)

- Minor bugs and issues corrections

Version 1.18.3 (28/04/18)

- Solved little errors in the app
- App size reduced
- New libs
- Maintenance

Version 1.18.2 (10/03/18)

- Solved UI errors
- Solved issues with calendar on Huawei devices
- Easter Egg ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Version 1.18.1 (09/03/18)

- In-app donations removed (for PayPal donations)
- Boost app start time

Version 1.18 (06/03/18)

- Load screen: now the logo is shown and also a progress bar while the app requests information
- New icons in cards: you will be able to see the evolution of the different BitCoin values
- Memory optimization and UI improvements
- Transitions between screens
- New update dialog: now the app is using official Google Play Store channel for updates
- Speed improvements and optimization too

Version 1.17 (21/02/18)

- UI optimizations and bug fixes
- BTC data corrected
- Included Firebase Crashalytics

Version 1.16 (20/02/18)

- App optimization & bug fixes
- Deleted floating action button - now implemented in three dots menu
- Included Firebase managing - analytics and more

Version 1.15 (01/02/18)

BIG UPDATE WITH A LOT OF CHANGES:
- Included new options: tab view in main screen
- Optimized code, application faster than ever
- BitCoin information in real time
- New charts, cards, and more
- Added missing libraries in "License"
- New dialogs, new styles, everything redefined
- Solved bugs: now, devices with Android Lollipop can use this application (there was an error an sometimes latest version crashed)
- And more…

Version 1.12 (25/01/18)

- Solved bugs when no Internet connection
- Implementation of new methods and libraries (see: License)
- New: changelog when app update (what you are reading)
- App optimization in order to not to get freeze (async threads)

Version 1.1 (23/01/18)

- Included notifications
- Added new dialogs when a new update is found
- Crash report included

Version 1.0 (23/12/17)

- Initial version

The market price is the current price at which an asset or service can be bought or sold.

Definition by: Investopedia

The hash rate is the measure of the capacity of processing BitCoins. For security reasons, BitCoin network has to perform very intense mathematical operations. If the network is working at 10 TH/s means that it can do 10 billion calculations per second.

Definition by: Bitcoin.org

Difficulty is a measure of how difficult it is to find a hash below a given target. The BitCoin network has a global block difficulty. Valid blocks must have a hash below this target. Mining pools also have a pool-specific share difficulty setting a lower limit for shares.

Definition by: Bitcoinwiki
Mined blocks (today) is the amount of blocks that confirms a BitCoin transaction to the rest of the network.
Minutes between blocks is the average time to mine a block (in minutes).

Transaction fees are a fee that spenders may include in any Bitcoin transaction. The fee may be collected by the miner who includes the transaction in a block.

Definition by: Bitcoinwiki

Total transaction is the amount of fees until now.

Definition by: Bitcoinwiki

When a block is discovered, the discoverer may award themselves a certain number of bitcoins, which is agreed-upon by everyone in the network. This is the mining benefits.

Definition by: Bitcoinwiki
Long click on the cards above for getting more information
Download BitCoin Pools, an app for getting information about BitCoin and more
